Title: Beaded Bodice Illusion Prom Evening Gown

----

Sku: C270

Price:

Saleprice:

Sizes: 14, 6, 8, 10, 12, 4

----

Colors: perry-blue

Category: formal-gowns

----

Featured-image: C270-perry-blue-beaded-bodice-illusion-prom-evening-gown_p.jpg

----

Description: A sheer bodice with capped sleeves is embellished with beads and rhinestones that cover the bust, midriff, and the trim of the waistline. The illusion continues to the back of the bodice and a circular cutout completes the flirty look. The floor length skirt is a pleated chiffon and flows with elegance.
